LoginRequest.title: Login Request
LoginRequest.description: Payload used for authenticating a user with email and password.

RegisterRequest.title: Register Request
RegisterRequest.description: Payload used to register a new user.

email.description: Valid email address. Must be unique.

StoreBoardRequest.title: Board Creation Request
StoreBoardRequest.description: Payload used to create a new board, optionally including initial columns.

name.description: Name of the board to be created. Must be between 3 and 50 characters.

columns.description: (Optional) List of columns to be created along with the board.

name.description: Name of the column. Must be between 3 and 50 characters.

StoreSubtaskRequest.title: Subtask Creation Request
StoreSubtaskRequest.description: Payload used to create a new subtask associated with an existing task.

name.description: Name of the subtask. Must be between 3 and 255 characters.

task_id.description: ID of the task that this subtask belongs to. Must exist in the database.

StoreTagRequest.title: Tag Creation Request
StoreTagRequest.description: Payload used to create a new tag.

name.description: Name of the tag. Must be between 3 and 255 characters.

color.description: Optional color for the tag, as a string (e.g., hex code or color name). Must be between 3 and 255 characters.

StoreTaskRequest.title: Task Creation Request
StoreTaskRequest.description: Payload to create a new task with optional subtasks and tags.

name.description: Name of the task. Must be between 3 and 255 characters.

description.description: Optional short description of the task.

column_id.description: ID of the column where this task belongs. Must belong to the authenticated user's board.

due_date.description: Optional due date for the task in YYYY-MM-DD format.

subtasks.description: Optional list of subtasks for this task.

tags.description: Optional list of tag IDs to associate with this task.

UpdateBoardRequest.title: Board Update Request
UpdateBoardRequest.description: Payload to update an existing board, optionally including columns.

name.description: New name of the board (optional). Must be between 3 and 50 characters and unique per user.

is_active.description: Flag to set the board as active or inactive.

columns.description: List of columns to update or add in the board.

uuid.description: UUID of the column to update. Omit for new columns.

name.description: Name of the column. Required if columns property is present.

order.description: Order of the column in the board. Lower values appear first.

UpdateSubtaskRequest.title: Subtask Update Request
UpdateSubtaskRequest.description: Payload to update an existing subtask.

name.description: Name of the subtask. Must be unique within the parent task.

order.description: Ordering index of the subtask relative to siblings.

UpdateTagRequest.title: Tag Update Request
UpdateTagRequest.description: Payload to update an existing tag.

name.description: Name of the tag. Must be unique.

color.description: Color associated with the tag. Must be unique.

UpdateTaskRequest.title: Task Update Request
UpdateTaskRequest.description: Payload for updating an existing task with optional fields and nested subtasks and tags.

column_id.description: ID of the column where the task belongs. Must be valid and belong to the authenticated user.

name.description: Name of the task, unique per column.

description.example: Detailed description about the login feature implementation.

order.description: Position order of the task in the column. Minimum value is 0.

due_date.description: Due date for the task in ISO 8601 format.

subtasks.description: Optional list of subtasks belonging to the task.

name.description: Name of the subtask, unique within the task.

tags.description: Optional list of tag IDs to associate with the task.

Board.title: Board
Board.description: Represents a board, including its columns and archived status.

name.description: Name of the board. Must be unique per user.

is_archived.description: Indicates whether the board is archived (true) or active (false).

columns.description: List of columns that belong to this board.

due_date.description: Due date and time of the task

items.example: The new_order must be at least 0.
